behavior.title: Exclude Comp/Collision Symbols when model year is less than 2011
behavior.description: These are ISO 75 Symbols which only apply to vehicles model year 2011 and newer. The symbols may be used in rating.

behavior.title: make GrossVehicleWeight Required for Commercial Truck type
Display privatePassengerInformation Section only if vehicleType is private passenger
Display truckTractorTrailerInformation Section only if vehicleType is Commercial or Truck/Tractor/Trailer
Display Principal Garaging Zone and FarthestTerminalZone only if vehicleType is Commercial or Truck/Tractor/Trailer and RadiusUse is LongDistance
Exclude Public Vehicle Section if vehicle type is not public
Display only when Vehicle Type != Public and Public Vehicle Type = (Van Pool - Employer Furnished or Van Pool - Other)
Display only when Vehicle Type = Public and Public Vehicle Type = (Van Pool - Employer Furnished or Van Pool - Other)

Display only when Vehicle Type = Public and Radius Use = Long Distance and Public Vehicle Type = (Airport Bus or Limousine or Inter-City Bus or Charter Bus or Sightseeing Bus or Bus - Transportation of Athletes or Entertainers or Bus - Social Service, Employee Operated or Bus - Social Service, All Other or Bus - Not Otherwise Classified)
Exclude special Vehicle Section if vehicle type is not special
Exclude numberOfDrivingInstructors if vehicle body type is not driving school
Exclude numberOfDrivingInstructors if vehicle body type is not driving school
Exclude Dual Controls if vehicle body type is not driving school
Exclude Motorcycle Engine Size if vehicle body type is not Motorcycle
Exclude Vehicle Class if vehicle body type is not FDNP,FNRE,MOBUN,SMEF
Exclude # of Registration Plates and DescriptionOfRegistrationPlates if vehicle body type is not RPSA
Exclude Medical Payments Limit field when vehicle type is special
ExcludePrincipally Operated by Employee field when vehicle type is not special
Exclude Uninsured/Underinsured Section if reject check box is selected
Exclude UMPD Section if reject check box is selected
Exclude UMCSLStackingOption if coverage type is not UMCSL or UMISP
Exclude UNCSLStackingOption if coverage type is not UMCSL or UMISP
Exclude single limit if UMUIM Option is not UMCSL
Exclude split limit if UMUIM Option is not UMISP
If Limit is entered for Traditional single, hide fields for Add On limits and other fields.
If Limit is entered for Traditional single, hide fields for Add On limits and other fields.
If Limit is entered for Traditional split, hide fields for Add On limits and other fields.
Exclude Cost New Limit field and StatedAmount field when vehicle type is special
Exclude towingAndLaborLimit field when vehicle type is not private passenger
Exclude Rental Reimb - # of Days,Audio, Visual and Data Electronic Equipment,Tapes/Records/Discs Coverage when vehicle type is special
Exclude Mutual Aid field when vehicle type is not special or public
Exclude AccidentPreventionCourseCompletionDate and DefensiveDrivingCourseCompletionDate field when vehicle type is special
Display only when Vehicle Type = Public and Public Vehicle Type != (Van Pool - Employer Furnished or Van Pool - Other)
Exclude # of Safety Features field when vehicle type is not private passenger
Display only when Vehicle Type = Truck, Tractor or Trailer
Display only when Vehicle Type = public
